extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected System and Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check if the system is affected by the CVE by retrieving the installed firmware version and configurations.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the system affected by the CVE?

extracted_playbook.title: Apply '2024-08 Cumulative Update'
extracted_playbook.description: Download and install the '2024-08 Cumulative Update' from Microsoft to patch security vulnerabilities.

extracted_playbook.title: Apply Security Patch '18-33624T' (Windows - 2024-08)

extracted_playbook.title: Apply Security Patch '18-34182G' (Windows - 2024-08)
extracted_playbook.description: Install the '18-34182G Windows Cumulative Security Patch - 2024-08' to mitigate identified security risks.

extracted_playbook.title: Apply Security Patch '18-34927A' (RM Image - Windows - 2024-08)
extracted_playbook.description: Install the '18-34927A RM Image Security Patch - Windows Cumulative Security Patch 2024-08' to mitigate identified security risks.
